text.autoconfig.ranitils.title: Ranitils
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.wearable:
Allows any item in armor slots

§7put torch on you head
disabling this doesn't disable the wear command
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.vertical:
Allows you to teleport vertically

§4Use at own your risk as it can get you banned
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.roadRunn:
Allows you to mine flat while digging since it doesn't break blocks under you

§7you can sneak to mine underneath
